titleStmt.title: Humane nature, or, The fundamental elements of policy being a discovery of the faculties, acts, and passions of the soul of man from their original causes, according to such philosophical principles as are not commonly known or asserted / by Tho. Hobbs.
titleStmt.author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.

editionStmt.edition: The third edition, augmented and much corrected by the authors own hand.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Matthew Gilliflower, Henry Rogers, and Tho. Fox,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
